definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The plan and technology of skip loading chamber construction in Jining No.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了济宁二号煤矿箕斗装载硐室施工方案及技术。

sentences.english: The mechanism of splitting type rock burst of round chamber is analyzed from microcosmic viewpoint.
sentences.chinese: 从微观角度分析了圆形硐室片帮型岩爆发生机制。

sentences.english: The Laodonggou gold deposit in the Erjinaqi, Inner Mongolia is an oxidizing-Leaching type gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 内蒙古额济纳旗老硐沟矿床为氧化淋滤型金矿床。

sentences.english: The plan and technology of skip loading chamber construction in Jining No. 2 Coal Mine are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了济宁二号煤矿箕斗装载硐室施工方案及技术。

sentences.english: The effect of the blasting of production on main transported adit was analyzed at Nanfen Iron Open-pit Mine.
sentences.chinese: 分析了南芬露天铁矿生产爆破对主运输平硐的影响。

sentences.english: The predicting result has a good agreement with the rock burst taken place in this tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 预测结果与后来隧硐中发生的岩爆实际情况接近。

sentences.english: So that designations and construction method of chamber blasting of phyllite are introduced, it obtained good blasting effect in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 硐室爆破的设计和施工方法，取得了较好的爆破效果。

sentences.english: The paper introduces a kind of blasting cave which is used for destroying abandon explosive materials.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种用于销毁废弃爆破器材的爆炸硐室。

sentences.english: The influence of blasting scheme on the cost of chamber blasting is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了爆破方案对硐室爆破成本的影响情况。

definition: bamboo conduit/wooden peg/spout/same as 筧|笕
